physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a mosque in the background. The mosque has a large dome at the centre
 with two smaller ones on either sides. Two of the minarets can be seen in the photograph. The balustrades on the parapets are also visible
 and there are balconies on the mosque as well. Nearer to the foreground is a road that is flanked by shophouses on either side. A lorry can be seen parked on the left side of the photograph and there are adults standing up and sitting down. Children and toddlers are also present.

metadata.title_text: Sultan Mosque Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a mosque in the background. The mosque has a large dome at the centre, with two smaller ones on either sides. Two of the minarets can be seen in the photograph. The balustrades on the parapets are also visible, and there are balconies on the mosque as well. Nearer to the foreground is a road that is flanked by shophouses on either side. A lorry can be seen parked on the left side of the photograph and there are adults standing up and sitting down. Children and toddlers are also present.
metadata.subject_terms_1: mosques (buildings) street scenes residential structures mercantile buildings
